extendedInfo.description: Deseret Bookshelf is a free, unique e-reader application designed specifically for LDS books and scripture study.While it is an enjoyable way to simply read a favorite book, it really shines as a gospel study tool. Scripture references in ebooks are linked to the Standard Works allowing you to explore scriptural connections. And Bookshelf's full-text search feature makes it easy to find quotes and key passages anywhere they appear in your library. When you download the app and login to your DeseretBook.com account, you will instantly receive 8 free classic LDS titles for your library as well as a copy of the Standard Works. Free titles include: 1. Jesus the Christ 2. Teachings of the Prophet Joseph Smith 3. Discourses of Brigham Young 4. Lectures on Faith 5. History of Joseph Smith by His Mother 6. The Miracle of Forgiveness 7. Gospel Doctrine 8. Autobiography of Parley P. Pratt The free titles plus the Standard Works require a one-time download after the app is installed. After you register or log in using your DeseretBook.com account, the free books should automatically start synchronizing with your device.Need help? Try our FAQs: http://deseretbook.com/bookshelf_faqNeed more help? Email us: downloads@deseretbook.comKeywords: Gospel Study, LDS Scriptures, Standard Works, Deseret Book, Mormon books

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Easy access and great offers make this spiritual and inspirational app a must have.
reviews.author: Daniel Irizarry

reviews.title: Love the convenience!
reviews.comment: Great to read something inspiring whenever you feel the need.
reviews.author: Chana Valencia

reviews.title: I was cool with it...
reviews.comment: I liked the app until I tried on the ipad.  The have better tavle of contents.  Every time you go to the table of context it rises up from th bottom of he screen.  For me I have to go to a different page and then loose my spot.  Plus, why cat we highlight.  This app is dfficult.  If it wasn\'t fo the books adpriceof books, I would begone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Great to have all my inspirational readings in one place. Love the free books u r able to download from time to time.
reviews.author: Amy Trump

reviews.title: Good content, needs audio books
reviews.comment: I love the concept, like the bundles snd deals they offer too. However,  I find that I\'ve gone through more material via audiobook than any other medium. Would get 5 stars if thst feature were added
reviews.author: cory rush

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great application for reading and studying the gospel. Remembers your bookmarks and had the ability to highlight or notate passages. My only complaint, is sometimes the app will switch chapters randomly and lose your place you were currently reading. Otherwise a perfect app.
reviews.author: Aaron Doty

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love Desseret Book\'s Bookshelf.  It has every book that I want and the prices aren\'t too bad. Goodtimes...
reviews.author: Jordan Jones

reviews.title: I love it. The books are very inspiring.  Fantastic
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Dorothy Adjorlolo

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: Fun convenient knowledge. I love it.
reviews.author: John Langston

reviews.title: Good app. Is it needed?
reviews.comment: The app functions well. I\'m just not sure why I need another ago in addition to Google Play Books or Kindle. Why not just publish the books there? Also the app turns the brightness up on my phone all the way with no way for me to adjust it.
reviews.author: Ken Cushing

reviews.title: Needs some touches but great app
reviews.comment: this app gets the job done and just needs some tweaks to make it 5 stars. Some have been mentioned below.  I\'d like to see it remember your position when you switch from landscape to portrait and vice versa.
reviews.author: Jeff Fernandez

reviews.title: Great content
reviews.comment: The main advantage of this app is the free books. I love having all the important works in one place. The layout and ease to read are areas that can be improved a lot, I don\'t like the continuous scrolling and the fonts have glitches
reviews.author: Raul Benitez

reviews.title: Missing buttons
reviews.comment: I like this reader but I just purchased a new book for it and had no way to download it into my reader.  The buttons (settings, etc) that are supposed to be in the top right corner are just not there on my screen.  I have a Samsung Galaxy Nexus.  Luckily after a few times opening and closing the reader, it automatically synced, so I have my new book.  But those missing buttons would be nice to have!
reviews.author: Merissa Hunt

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: Great app.  I love the convienience of always having uplifting words in my pocket.  I get so excited to read the next book.
reviews.author: Jay Hunt

reviews.title: Love the books I can get here but...
reviews.comment: I have a hard time getting the bookmarks to work correctly, and other features seem like they could use a little work.  I love the books I just wish it worked better.
reviews.author: Karina Carson

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Sometimes it is hard to turn pages. Graphically, parts look fuzzy. Cannot purchase from the app, cannot sync or sign out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bookshelf review
reviews.comment: DB Bookshelf is just average. I use iton my Nook and get frustrayed because its ereader function is not as user freindly as the nook. I find that I lose my place frequently. When  I return to the app I have to locate my place again. And I wish I cou,d turn pabes instead of having toscroll up and down.
reviews.author: April Talley

reviews.title: Bad.
reviews.comment: Archaic.  Slow.  NOT user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: I love how accessible the ebooks are on this app. The one thing that needs to be improved is the page turning. The books aren\'t consistent. Sometimes you swipe to turn a page; sometimes you have to use the arrows. If they all had the same turning capability, then 5 stars is the rating.
reviews.author: Lorena Brown

reviews.title: Inspiration on the go!
reviews.comment: Love how user friendly it is, and how easily i can use it with scripture study.
reviews.author: Lisah-Marie Purcell
